item.title: Clojure to Common Lisp - Part 3 - Sample CRUD App
item.description: This post deals with writing a simple CRUD application in Common Lisp. The code for this demo project is available on github Introduction We will write a simple TODO list application which will store its data in a postgres database. This application will have a basic terminal based interface. Running The Application Clone the git repository into a location where asdf can find it. $ cd ~/common-lisp $ git clone https://github.
